Articles.Content:
After my account fell victim to the forum crash, I finally got to re establish myself in the community, so let me (re-) introduce myself:

I am 26, from Berlin in Germany, Sci-Fi and space enthusiast and I love KSP, its Community, this Forum and Squad for one of the most awesome games ever .

I have "played" Orbit Space Simulator for a long time, but i never became really good enough in orbital mechanics to really master it. KSP on the other hand, allowed me to learn how to bring a rocket to orbit, why i need the rocket to performe a gravity turn and how to get to other planets (reaching Mun for the first time in the v.12 demo was breathtaking, to bad I accidentaly deleted all my pictures -.-). On top off that, I can do that with self build rockets. This game is just awesome. Thanks to Squad .

Welcome back to the forums CptNuts

Have fun and fly safe, and keep your pics safe in case there's a next time

Thanks Guys

I started putting my pics in a seperate folder when ever I change my Version or experiment with mods (which usually ends with reinstalling KSP in vanilla to be able to use it again XD)
